Project Description:
Chevron operates the 487,000-acre (1,969-sq-km) Chuandongbei natural gas area in the onshore Sichuan Basin. Having a 49.0 percent interest in project. The full development includes two sour gas processing plants connected by a gas gathering system to five natural gas fields. In 2014, the company continued construction of the first natural gas processing plant and development of the Luojiazhai and Gunziping natural gas fields. The first plant�â��s initial three trains have a design outlet capacity of 258.0 million cubic feet per day. The first train reached mechanical completion in late 2014, and commissioning work began. Start-up is expected in 2015.0 The project has a total design capacity of 558.0 million cubic feet of natural gas per day.

fuses them to get a good quality image.
– Term work II : Sentiment Analysis using LSTM.
Summary : Completed a presentation on the topic Sentiment Analysis using LSTM (Long
Short Term Memory) for IMDB data set.
– Mini Project : Stock price prediction and analysis for IT sector using DMD
Summary : The focus of this work was to predict stock price for NSE listed IT sector
companies using DMD (dynamic mode decomposition), a data driven algorithm and to
compare it with existing models(ARIMA).
– Main Project : Stock price prediction using deep learning models
Summary : The proposed work uses four different deep learning architectures (RNN,
LSTM, CNN, and MLP) for predicting the minute wise stock price for NSE listed companies
and compares the performance of the models. The method implemented is a sliding window
based approach for predicting future values on a short-term basis.
